name: understanding-transpilers-and-bundlers
description: Playground to understand the code generated from different transpilers.
author: nosolosw

scripts.transpile:arrow-functions:closure: google-closure-compiler src/arrow-functions.js --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > examples/arrow-functions.closure.js
scripts.transpile:export-default:closure: google-closure-compiler src/export-default.js --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > examples/export-default.closure.js
scripts.transpile:export-named:closure: google-closure-compiler src/export-named.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > examples/export-named.closure.js
scripts.transpile:export:closure: google-closure-compiler src/export.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > examples/export.closure.js
scripts.transpile:import-default:closure: google-closure-compiler src/import-default.js src/export-default.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > examples/import-default.closure.js
scripts.transpile:import-named:closure: google-closure-compiler src/import-named.js src/export-named.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > examples/import-named.closure.js
scripts.transpile:import:closure: google-closure-compiler src/import.js src/export.js src/export-default.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > examples/import.closure.js
